bioconda.name: bioconductor-interactivedisplay
bioconda.summary: Package for enabling powerful shiny web displays of Bioconductor objects

biotools.summary: This package contains the methods needed to generate interactive Shiny-based display methods for BioConductor objects.

bioschemas.name: interactiveDisplay
bioschemas.summary: This package contains the methods needed to generate interactive Shiny-based display methods for BioConductor objects.
